subject: Greetings my beloved,
body:
Greetings my beloved,
My name is Mr.maxwell tobo  ,I am a deaf man and also a cancer
patient who had decided to donate what I have to you for God's works. I
want to donate $8.5 million to you so that you will use part of the this
fund to help the poor ones,while you use the rest for your family.If you
are interested,Respond now for more details on how to receive this fund.
always Reply here
Regards,
Mr.maxwell tobo

subject: Re:   Greetings my beloved,
body:
Hello Tobo,

I'm deeply touched by your message and your intention to help others despite the challenges you're facing. It's truly inspiring. I'm curious, how did you come across my contact? Also, could you please share more details about this donation process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Greetings my beloved,
body:
Before we can collectively achieve this together, You are required to send
to me the following information, First name.................... Middle
name................ Last name...................
Address........................ Age..............................
City............................ State........................ Zip/Postal
code........... Nationality................... Home
phone................... Cell phone................... Why this information
is needed is to enable us to secure the change of beneficiary name in favor
of you in the security firm. The affidavit of change of ownership will be
submitted to the Bank and once the change is successfully made, you become
a full beneficiary to the claim of the fund. on attached

subject: Re: Greetings my beloved,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the process to me. I must say, it sounds quite interesting! However, I'm a bit confused about why you need my personal information. Could you please explain more about this "change of ownership" process? How does it work exactly? And what is the role of the security firm in all this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Greetings my beloved,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the process to me. I must say, it sounds quite interesting! However, I'm a bit confused about why you need my personal information. Could you please elaborate on how this change of ownership works? And what exactly is an affidavit of change of ownership?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Greetings my beloved,
body:

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund transfer process. I'm not very familiar with banking procedures, so could you please explain why the transfer from Woodforest National Bank to my country's bank account would incur charges? 

Also, it's reassuring to know that a lawyer will handle the documents on my behalf. Could you tell me more about his role in this process?

Lastly, I noticed you mentioned The Anti Drug, The Anti Terrorist and The Anti Money Laundering. Are these some sort of certifications or checks that need to be cleared for the transfer? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Steven
